Character

Class DumbTargettingEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Element
      • Character.Enemy
        • Character.DumbTargettingEnemy

  • public class DumbTargettingEnemy
extends Enemy
    Class for dumb enemy, always moves towards the player even if its into a wall.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Miles Singleton, Andy Kuo
